titleStmt.title: Englands valor, and Hollands terrour: being an encouragement for seamen and souldiers to serve his Majesty in his wars against the Dutch, &c. Dutchmen beware, we have a fleet ... To the tune of, The stormy winds do blow.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, W. Gilbertson, and I Wright.

notesStmt.note: Right half sheet contains "The second part, to the same tune."
Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
